title: Client Sales Executive
description:
**Client Executive – New business - Sweden** 




 Want to be part of our growth into Sweden? Keen to work with Okta on industry leading Identity Solutions then apply now.
 



  





 As a New Business Client Executive in Identity and Access Management Cybersecurity space, you’ll be responsible for identifying, pursuing, and acquiring new business opportunities within targeted industries. Your focus will be on understanding the IAM needs of potential clients, articulating our service value, and positioning our solutions to drive revenue growth.
 



 You must be a a self-motivated sales professional with a strong understanding of the IAM landscape and a passion for securing long-term client partnerships.
 



  





**Key Skills Required:** 



* **Sales & Business Development:** 
 Lead generation, pipeline management, and achieving sales targets in the IAM and cybersecurity sectors.
* **Client Engagement:** 
 Conducting needs assessments, tailoring IAM solutions, and building long-term client relationships.
* **Industry Knowledge:** 
 An understanding of IAM solutions, emerging threats, and market trends. Okta ideal, One Identity Manager, Sailpoint, CyberArk etc also considered (with the interest of learning Okta)
* **Communication & Presentation:** 
 Delivering tailored presentations, product demos, and client proposals.
* **Collaboration & CRM:** 
 Working with internal teams, vendors, and maintaining CRM systems (e.g., HubSpot) for sales tracking and reporting.
* **Self-Motivation & Organization:** 
 Proactive, results-driven, and detail-oriented with a focus on long-term business growth.
* **Languages:** 
 Fluent Swedish and English



  





**Key Responsibilities:** 



* **Business Development & Client Acquisition:** 
 Identify and engage potential clients in the IAM space, build a quality sales pipeline, and tailor solutions based on client needs to drive sales and meet targets.
* **Sales Strategy & Market Research:** 
 Develop and execute sales strategies aligned with company goals, stay informed on industry trends, and engage with vendors to enhance proposals and sales efforts.
* **Solution Presentation & Proposal Development:** 
 Present IAM solutions effectively, create tailored presentations, and prepare detailed proposals in line with client needs, ensuring approval and timely submission.
* **Collaboration & Reporting:** 
 Work with technical teams to align solutions with client needs, track sales activities, forecast revenue, and maintain accurate CRM records.



  





**Location:** 



* **Must be based in Sweden**



  





**What We Offer:** 



* Competitive salary + benefits, including flexible remote working and your birthday off
* 5 dedicated training days per year + access to LinkedIn Learning
* Opportunities for professional growth in a collaborative and innovative team



  





 If you're a passionate about selling leading IAM solutions, we want to hear from you! Apply now or email us at careers@intragen.com.
 



 Intragen is an equal opportunity employer. We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees.

title: Senior Backend Engineer (Gateway)
description:
*We are Tibber, the energy company that wants you to use less energy. Whaaat? That’s right. We’ll get back to that. Yes, we are by definition an energy company, but we’re more techy than most. How and why you might ask? Well, a third of our employees are actually working on developing products and solutions that can help you use energy in a smarter way and at a lower cost – all with the help of cool fancy tech. Good for our customers, their wallets, and the planet.*
*Our growth rate has been truly amazing, and still, we’re just getting started. With millions of smart devices connected to the Tibber platform (like electric vehicles and smart thermostats), we have one of the most unique portfolios trading energy on the market* 
 .
   

  

**Job Mission 🚀🚀**
 In the Product Experience product area, we build many of the features that our customers love - from signup and onboarding to the Tibber home screen as well as all the charts and analysis, powered by consumption and behavioral data.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
 We’re on a quest to find a Senior Backend Engineer for our Product Experience area. You will help us build and maintain parts of our backend, serving the apps and our customers with all the data needed in the apps. The role entails close cooperation with other Backend Engineers, App Engineers, Designers, and Data Scientists within our various product areas. Some of your responsibilities (but not limited to) include:
   

  

* Building and maintaining the GraphQL layer between the apps and the backend services
* Bringing new ideas to the table
* Championing your vision of what the system architecture should be
* Pushing for experimentation
* Debugging system-wide effects
* Demoing
* Keeping up with technical developments in the field


 You are not expected to juggle all the above at the same time, but you should ideally be a versatile Engineer who thrives in a scale-up environment.
   

  

**Ability to build, contribute to, and maintain relevant services and tools.** 
 You would be a key contributor - a Senior Backend Engineer cooperating closely with other Gateway Engineers. You would be integrating numerous microservices to ensure seamless data flow to the apps.
   

  

**Engineering contribution.** 
 As part of the Engineering culture here at Tibber, we always strive to further develop how we work with everything from tooling to architecture and collaboration. You’re expected to take an active part in that work and those discussions.
   

  

**Ideally you have ⚡️⚡️**
**Tech expertise.** 
 You thrive designing, building, and maintaining software in technologies like Javascript, Typescript, Node.js, GraphQL. You are comfortable in an AWS and Kubernetes environment and with owning what you built.
   

  

**Microservices experience.** 
 Knowledgeable with a microservices architecture in high throughout cloud environments.
   

  

**App appreciation.** 
 Experience working with a customer-facing mobile app. We don’t expect you to contribute in Kotlin or Swift, but an understanding of how mobile apps work will certainly help.
   

  

**Adaptability.** 
 You should enjoy and understand that some things can't be done proactively. Sometimes you will need to be reactive, as we like to iterate on customer feedback and quite often ship features early to see how they are received.
   

  

**Industry expertise** 
 . Understanding the energy industry is a bonus.
   

  

**Culturally in sync.** 
 Curious and collaborative mindset with a bold yet humble approach to engineering.
   

  

**🦹🏽‍♀️👨‍🎤Get Ready For**
**Innovation.** 
 A way to change the landscape of one of the most important industries on the planet.
   

  

**Growth.** 
 A possibility to learn a lot and push the barriers of what you think is possible, with the possibility to grow personally and professionally.
   

  

**Autonomy.** 
 An autonomous and humble culture in a scale-up adventure.
   

  

**Empowerment.** 
 Your voice matters, we are a place to work where laughter and support amongst diverse and inclusive colleagues are guaranteed.
   

  

**Flexibility.** 
 Whether this is towards health, wellness, equipment, or other allowances important to you, we will do our best to accommodate your needs. Many of us are parents and we all value a good work-life balance.
   

  

**💆🏻‍♀️💆🏽‍♂️The Tibber Mindset**
 Being on a mission to change an industry as we do fundamentally also means being prepared for the unexpected. Tibber is a startup in the word's true sense, which means we are on a journey of constant change. We do what others say can’t be done, try and fail together but never lose sight of our users.
   

  

 We work passionately with sustainability and a circular approach, both with our products and in the entire ecosystem that is affected by everything we do.
   

  

 We're very proud of being a mission-driven startup with thousands and thousands of new users every month. Starting out with two passionate founders in 2016, we're now 300+ people working for Tibber in our offices in Stockholm, Førde, Berlin, Amsterdam, Oslo, and Helsinki, and with that number growing each week, we’re still just getting started. Through 2024 we will continue to grow within our markets, and we are thrilled to be backed by investors like Balderton Capital, Eight Roads Ventures, Founders Fund, Summa, and Schibsted.
   

  

*At Tibber, we are committed to hiring, developing, and retaining exceptional people regardless of race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, age, marital status, disability, neurodiversity, or gender identity. We strongly encourage people from underrepresented groups to apply.*
 Tibber is a different company in a very traditional industry. We are aiming to create the best digital tool so that you as a user can apply new technologies to reduce energy consumption and power costs.

title: Senior Enterprise Account Executive, Growth
description:
MongoDB’s mission is to empower innovators to create, transform, and disrupt industries by unleashing the power of software and data. We enable organizations of all sizes to easily build, scale, and run modern applications by helping them modernize legacy workloads, embrace innovation, and unleash AI. Our industry-leading developer data platform, MongoDB Atlas, is the only globally distributed, multi-cloud database and is available in more than 115 regions across AWS, Google Cloud, and Microsoft Azure. Atlas allows customers to build anywhere—on the edge, on premises, or across cloud providers. With offices worldwide and over 175,000 developers joining MongoDB every month, it’s no wonder that leading organizations, like Samsung and Toyota, trust MongoDB to build next-generation, AI-powered applications.
   

  

**About The Role**
 We’re looking for a hardworking, driven individual with superb energy, passion and initiative for new business acquisition. The Account Executive role focuses exclusively on formulating and executing a sales strategy within an assigned territory, resulting in revenue growth and new customer acquisition.
   

  

 We are looking to speak to candidates who are based in Stockholm for our hybrid working model.
   

  

**About The Sales Culture**
 MongoDB is always developing and innovating — not only in our technology, but also in our sales go-to-market strategy. Our sales leadership is committed to building the best salesforce in technology. This means, inspiring and enabling success for everyone on the team. We not only equip you to be successful and close deals, but we want your feedback and input on how we can continue to “Think Big and Go Far.” As a crucial part of the Sales team at MongoDB, you will have access to a lucrative market and learn how to sell from some of the most successful sales leaders in the software industry.
   

  

 What you will be doing
   

  

* Proactively, identify, qualify and close a sales pipeline (100% net new logos)
* Strategically prospect into CTOs, Engineering/IT Leaders, & technical end users
* Build strong and effective relationships, resulting in growth opportunities
* Partner with our Solution Architects and work closely with the Professional Services team to achieve customer satisfaction
* Work closely with the enterprise ecosystem partner sales and channel partner to maximise deal sizes
* Participate in our sales enablement trainings, including our comprehensive Sales Bootcamp, sophisticated sales training, and leadership and development programs


 What you will bring to the table
   

  

* 2+ years field experience of quota-carrying experience in a fast-paced and competitive market with a focus on strategically growing accounts
* Demonstrated ability to open new accounts and run a complex sales process
* A proven track record of overachievement and hitting sales targets
* Ability to articulate the business value of complex enterprise technology
* Skilled in building business champions
* Driven and competitive. Possess a strong desire to be successful
* Fluent in English


 Things we love
   

  

* Passionate about growing your career in the largest market in software (database)
* Previous Sales Methodology training (e.g. MEDDIC, SPIN, Challenger Sales)
* Familiarity with databases, develops and open source technology a plus


 Why join now
   

  

* Accelerators up to 30%
* Best in breed Sales trainings in MEDDIC and Command of the Message, including our comprehensive Sales Bootcamps and development programs
* New hire stock equity (RSUs) and employee stock purchase plan
* Generous and competitive benefits (parental leave, fertility & wellbeing support)


 To drive the personal growth and business impact of our employees, we’re committed to developing a supportive and enriching culture for everyone. From employee affinity groups, to fertility assistance and a generous parental leave policy, we value our employees’ wellbeing and want to support them along every step of their professional and personal journeys. Learn more about what it’s like to work at MongoDB, and help us make an impact on the world!
   

  

 MongoDB is committed to providing any necessary accommodations for individuals with disabilities within our application and interview process. To request an accommodation due to a disability, please inform your recruiter.
   

  

 MongoDB is an equal opportunities employer.

title: Lösningsarkitekt - Microsoft 365
description:
**Alleima Group IT Functions ansvarar för strategi och drift av gemensamma IT-lösningar globalt. I nära samarbete med våra divisioner ansvarar vi för områden som Digital säkerhet, IT-upphandlingar, IT Finans, IT-arkitektur, Koncernapplikationer, IT-infrastruktur och Digitala arbetsplatstjänster. Inom avdelningen för Digitala arbetsplatstjänster har vi ett team med lösningsarkitekter och tjänsteägare som tillsammans med våra tredjepartsleverantörer levererar en modern digital arbetsplats till våra ca: 7000 slutanvändare globalt.**
**Hit söker vi nu en erfaren och driven lösningsarkitekt som vill vara med och utveckla framtidens digitala arbetsplats med hjälp av smarta och effektiva lösningar med Microsoft 365-plattformen.**
**Din roll**
 Rollen som lösningsarkitekt för Microsoft 365 är en global roll där du arbetar nära vår verksamhet för att förstå deras behov och tillsammans med teamet designa, införa och optimera Microsofts lösningar för att leverera hållbara arbetsplatslösningar som underlättar samarbete och ökar produktiviteten.
   

  

**Tekniska kunskaper för att vara framgångsrik i rollen:**
* Har djup teknisk kunskap om Microsoft 365 och dess olika verktyg.
* Har erfarenhet av att designa och implementera lösningar i Microsoft 365.
* Är lösningsorienterad, kommunikativ och trivs med att arbeta i team.
* Har förmåga att förstå kundens behov och översätta dem till effektiva tekniska lösningar.


 Kort sagt – vi söker en praktisk lösningsarkitekt som bidrar till den vardagliga digitala verktygslådan och funktionaliteten för alla slutanvändare globalt. I utbyte kommer du att få möjligheten att utvecklas och jobba med de nyaste funktionerna inom Microsoft 365 och digitala lösningar.
   

  

 Placeringsort för tjänsten är i Sandviken eller Stockholm.
   

  

**Din Profil**
 Vi söker dig som är lösningsorienterad, kommunikativ och bidrar till att teamet levererar lösningar på allt som rör slutanvändarnas digitala arbetsplats. Till det behöver du ha en relevant utbildningsbakgrund och en examen inom IT, alternativt erfarenhet och kunskaper från en liknande roll som bedöms likvärdig. Tidigare erfarenhet av storskaliga Microsoft-miljöer och IT-arkitektur bedöms meriterande.
   

  

 Stor vikt kommer att läggas vid dina personliga egenskaper där vi värdesätter din passion och personlighet som kännetecknas av hög servicenivå och ett öga för kvalitet. Du har förmågan att förstå affärsbehov och hantera förväntningar från verksamheten för att säkerställa att IT kan möta det som behövs. Vidare behöver du även en stark kommunikationsförmåga där du kan förklara tekniska lösningar för alla nivåer med en förmåga att sätta planer och strategier. Då vi är ett multinationellt bolag behöver du trivas med att etablera och bibehålla goda relationer och samarbeten. Det innebär också att du hanterar svenska och engelska väl, både i tal och skrift.
   

  

**Vad du kan förvänta dig av oss**
 På Alleima är vi övertygade om att mångfald och inkludering leder till en bättre arbetsplats för våra anställda, vårt företag och våra kunder.
   

  

**Vi bryr oss:** 
 Vi är stolta över det vi gör. Vi bryr oss om våra kunder, våra medarbetare, miljön, de samhällen där vi verkar och den framtid vi delar.
   

  

**Vi levererar:** 
 Vi levererar på våra åtaganden, med ett lösningsorienterat tankesätt gör vi det möjligt för våra kunder att vara deras allra bästa: Mer effektiva, lönsamma och hållbara.
   

  

**Vi utvecklas:** 
 Vi utvecklas ständigt. Tillsammans tar vi ledningen för att främja material, ambitioner, industrier, oss själva – och samhällen till det bättre.
   

  

**Övrig information**
 För mer information om tjänsten är du välkommen att kontakta:
   

  

 Niklas Hammarberg, rekryterande chef, +46 70-632 05 43
   

  

 För frågor angående rekryteringsprocessen, vänligen kontakta:
   

  

 Per Hammas, ansvarig rekryterare, +46 79-098 49 50
   

  

**Fackliga Kontaktpersoner**
 Maria Sundqvist, Akademikerföreningen, 070 651 73 81
   

  

 Kjell-Åke Klockervold, Ledarna, 070 314 24 43
   

  

 Mikael Larsson, Unionen, 070 307 30 48
   

  

**Du är välkommen med din ansökan senast 2025-01-12. Notera att annonsen ligger ute under julledigheten och urval kommer att ske efter sista ansökningsdatum.**
 På Alleima är vårt uppdrag mycket mer än att leverera högkvalitativa produkter, teknologi och processer – genom samarbete utvecklar vi de bästa lösningarna efter våra kunders behov och att det är så vi uppnår våra affärsmål är bästa sättet att beskriva vårt dagliga arbete. Med nyfikna medarbetare och säkerheten som vår första prioritet, skapar vi en arbetsmiljö där Du kan utvecklas både som person och i ditt arbete.
   

  

 Med en tydlig riktning för vår resa, där vi nyttjar vår position som teknologiledare, progressiv affärspartner och där vi är drivande vad gäller hållbarhet, syftar vi till att bli ett ännu starkare bolag inom vår industri.
   

  

 Är Du redo att anta denna utmaning tillsammans med oss? Följ med på vår resa! www.alleima.com

title: Teknisk Systemförvaltare Nilex
description:
*Är du en analytisk person som drivs av nya utmaningar? Vill du arbeta med systemförvaltning på en myndighet där du gör verklig skillnad? Då kan detta vara jobbet för dig!*
**Om tjänsten**
 I rollen som Teknisk Systemförvaltare av ärendehanteringssystemet Nilex för servicedesk kommer du att ingå i sektion systemförvaltning på IT-enheten. Du kommer arbeta med att uppdatera och konfigurera applikationen samt genomföra förändringar på uppdrag av systemförvaltaren som du har löpande kontakt med. Vidare ingår också omvärldsbevakning, incidenthantering, felavhjälpning samt användarstöd. Du blir även ansvarig för den tekniska lösningen/miljön och för att säkerställa att applikationsdriften fungerar.
   

  

 Du kommer även arbeta nära med driftansvarig som sköter den underliggande infrastrukturen för systemet.
   

  

 Teknisk systemförvaltning av ärendehanteringssystemet Nilex kommer vara huvuduppgiften men även ett antal mindre system kan på sikt komma att ingå i ditt förvaltningsansvar.
   

  

  

**Har du den kompetensprofil vi behöver**
 ?
   

  

* Aktuell eftergymnasial utbildning inom IT-området, gärna inom systemvetenskap.
* Erfarenhet av att arbeta med systemförvaltning på en teknisk nivå.
* God förmåga att uttrycka dig på svenska och engelska i både tal och skrift.


 För att trivas i rollen ser vi att du är analytisk person och arbetar bra med komplexa frågor. Du noggrann och strukturerad samt har en god samarbetsförmåga. Vidare är du självgående och har förmåga att driva ditt arbete framåt mot uppställda mål med goda resultat. Vi lägger stor vikt vid dina personliga egenskaper.
   

  

  

**Meriterande**
* Erfarenhet av att arbeta med systemförvaltning av ärendehanteringssystem för servicedesk.


**Vad erbjuder vi dig?**
 FOI erbjuder en unik arbetsplats, där du får möjlighet att arbeta med det som är viktigt för både totalförsvaret och hela samhället. FOI är en statlig myndighet under Försvarsdepartementet och är ett av Europas ledande forskningsinstitut inom försvar och säkerhet.
   

  

 Tjänsten är en tillsvidareanställning som kan komma att inledas med sex månaders provanställning.
   

  

 Vi arbetar medvetet för en god arbetsmiljö med en bra balans mellan arbete och privatliv. Utöver detta erbjuder vi en rad förmåner. Läs mer om hur det är att jobba hos oss: https://www.foi.se/jobba-hos-oss.html
   

  

  

**Vill du vara med och söka svaren för en säkrare värld?**
 Välkommen med din ansökan i form av CV och personligt brev via ansökningsknappen senast den
   

**6 januari 2025.**
 För mer information om tjänsten är du välkommen att kontakta Mathias Sarri. Fackliga företrädare är Fredrik Ringblom (Saco-S) och Jonas Svefors (OFR/S – ST). Samtliga nås på 08-555 030 00.
   

  

 Då anställningen är placerad i säkerhetsklass krävs svenskt medborgarskap. Säkerhetsprövning med registerkontroll kommer att genomföras före anställning enligt säkerhetsskyddslagen (2018:585). Inför säkerhetsprövning kommer den slutkandidat som är aktuell för tjänsten behöva lämna in vidimerade kopior på av oss angivna utbildnings-/examensbevis samt tjänstgöringsintyg som styrker de kunskaper och erfarenheter som är relevanta för tjänsten.
   

  

 FOI är en myndighet varmed inlämnade ansökningshandlingar blir allmän handling som på begäran kan lämnas ut till utomstående enligt offentlighets- och sekretesslagen.
   

  

 Erbjudanden från rekryteringsföretag undanbedes.

title: Global Account Manager (GAM) - EU
description:
**Job Description**
**Company** 
 :
   

  

 Cogent Communications is a multinational, Tier 1 facilities-based ISP, consistently ranked as one of the top five networks in the world and is publicly traded on the NASDAQ Stock Market under the ticker symbol CCOI. Cogent specializes in providing businesses with high speed Internet access, Ethernet transport services and is one of the only US providers who own and operate their own fibre infrastructure spanning the US for diverse Wave connectivity. Cogent's facilities-based, all-optical IP network backbone provides IP services in over 235 markets globally. Since its inception, Cogent has unleashed the benefits of IP technology, building one of the largest and highest capacity IP networks in the world. This network enables Cogent to offer large bandwidth connections at highly competitive prices. Cogent also offers superior customer support by virtue of its end-to-end control of service delivery and network monitoring.
   

  

**Position Overview:**
 The Global Account Manager is responsible for identifying and securing new business opportunities globally. By employing consultative selling techniques and relationship-building strategies, you will work directly with the nation’s leading IT Decision Makers to position Cogent's connectivity solutions. This role involves proactive outreach through direct calling, email, and onsite meetings, with a strong focus on understanding clients' current and future connectivity needs. Success in this position will be measured by meeting or exceeding monthly revenue goals and establishing Cogent as a trusted partner across commercial and retail buildings, carrier-neutral hotels, data centers, and colocation facilities.
   

  

**Responsibilities** 
 :
   

  

* Identify, qualify, and secure new business opportunities within a global sales territory, focusing on market segments who require IP transit, Wave connectivity, Ethernet, Colocation and IPv4 services.
* Use direct calling, email outreach, and customer meetings to connect with Key Decision Makers and generate new business opportunities.
* Employ consultative and relationship-driven sales approaches to identify prospective clients’ current and future connectivity needs.
* Position Cogent’s services as the preferred choice by leveraging our extensive global network footprint, which spans commercial and retail buildings, carrier-neutral hotels, data centers, and colocation facilities.
* Collaborate with internal teams to ensure customer needs are met and expectations exceeded.
* Maintain and update detailed records of sales activities in CRM systems, tracking progress, and managing customer relationships.


**Qualifications** 
 :
   

  

* Telesales experience in any industry, with B2B sales experience being an advantage
* Proven ability to identify, qualify, and generate new business opportunities through proactive prospecting and research.
* Strong communication skills, both oral and written, with the ability to engage effectively with Key Decision Makers.
* Self-motivated, positive, and proactive, with a passion for adding value to clients and excelling in a competitive, revenue-driven environment.
* Ability to work independently in a fast-paced, team-oriented and competitive environment with revenue-driven goals and rewards.
* Familiarity with CRM systems and basic proficiency in Microsoft Office are beneficial.
* Telecommunications experience or knowledge of connectivity solutions is advantageous but not essential.
* Cogent operates a global sales model so foreign language skills are an advantage


**Work Environment:**
 This is an in-office position, five days a week, designed to support your success through focused mentorship, training, and personal coaching.
   

  

 To apply for the Global Account Manager position, please submit your resume and cover letter to careers@cogentco.com .
   

  

 Cogent Communications is an Equal Opportunity Employer.
   

  

**Company** 
 :
   

  

 Cogent Communications is a multinational, Tier 1 facilities-based ISP, consistently ranked as one of the top five networks in the world and is publicly traded on the NASDAQ Stock Market under the ticker symbol CCOI. Cogent specializes in providing businesses with high speed Internet access, Ethernet transport services and is one of the only US providers who own and operate their own fibre infrastructure spanning the US for diverse Wave connectivity. Cogent's facilities-based, all-optical IP network backbone provides IP services in over 235 markets globally. Since its inception, Cogent has unleashed the benefits of IP technology, building one of the largest and highest capacity IP networks in the world. This network enables Cogent to offer large bandwidth connections at highly competitive prices. Cogent also offers superior customer support by virtue of its end-to-end control of service delivery and network monitoring.
   

  

**Position Overview:**
 The Global Account Manager is responsible for identifying and securing new business opportunities globally. By employing consultative selling techniques and relationship-building strategies, you will work directly with the nation’s leading IT Decision Makers to position Cogent's connectivity solutions. This role involves proactive outreach through direct calling, email, and onsite meetings, with a strong focus on understanding clients' current and future connectivity needs. Success in this position will be measured by meeting or exceeding monthly revenue goals and establishing Cogent as a trusted partner across commercial and retail buildings, carrier-neutral hotels, data centers, and colocation facilities.
   

  

**Responsibilities** 
 :
   

  

* Identify, qualify, and secure new business opportunities within a global sales territory, focusing on market segments who require IP transit, Wave connectivity, Ethernet, Colocation and IPv4 services.
* Use direct calling, email outreach, and customer meetings to connect with Key Decision Makers and generate new business opportunities.
* Employ consultative and relationship-driven sales approaches to identify prospective clients’ current and future connectivity needs.
* Position Cogent’s services as the preferred choice by leveraging our extensive global network footprint, which spans commercial and retail buildings, carrier-neutral hotels, data centers, and colocation facilities.
* Collaborate with internal teams to ensure customer needs are met and expectations exceeded.
* Maintain and update detailed records of sales activities in CRM systems, tracking progress, and managing customer relationships.


**Qualifications** 
 :
   

  

* Telesales experience in any industry, with B2B sales experience being an advantage
* Proven ability to identify, qualify, and generate new business opportunities through proactive prospecting and research.
* Strong communication skills, both oral and written, with the ability to engage effectively with Key Decision Makers.
* Self-motivated, positive, and proactive, with a passion for adding value to clients and excelling in a competitive, revenue-driven environment.
* Ability to work independently in a fast-paced, team-oriented and competitive environment with revenue-driven goals and rewards.
* Familiarity with CRM systems and basic proficiency in Microsoft Office are beneficial.
* Telecommunications experience or knowledge of connectivity solutions is advantageous but not essential.
* Cogent operates a global sales model so foreign language skills are an advantage


**Work Environment:**
 This is an in-office position, five days a week, designed to support your success through focused mentorship, training, and personal coaching.
   

  

 To apply for the Global Account Manager position, please submit your resume and cover letter to careers@cogentco.com .
   

  

 Cogent Communications is an Equal Opportunity Employer.

title: Functional Safety Engineer
description:
Etteplan is a leading technical consulting company shaping the industries of the future. We are over 4000 technology specialists within several industries, and we shape the innovations and developments of the future within a global business environment.


We are looking for passionate tech experts. Do you thrive in dynamic, fast-paced environments where innovation is the norm, not the exception? Then this role might be the right fit for you!


Your role


* Plan and coordinate functional safety activities, working closely with internal teams and automotive suppliers, and regularly interface with suppliers to manage technical safety requirements and project statuses.
* Initiate and complete the Safety Case with necessary evidence, support the development of functional safety work products, ensure completion of safety audits and assessments, and lead safety analysis activities (e.g., SFMEA, FMEA, FMEDA).
* Provide coaching on functional safety processes and methods, participate in safety reviews, and contribute to risk identification and mitigation for safety-related issues.



Your profile



We place great emphasis on personal qualities and are looking for someone who wants to grow with us. You are a person who likes to take on new challenges, takes personal responsibility and is used to working towards set goals. You are genuinely interested in technology and stay up to date on trends. You are innovative and like to collaborate with others.


To succeed in this role you need to:


* Over 3 years of proven and relevant work experience in embedded systems, preferably within the automotive industry.
* Strong background in system engineering with both hardware and software expertise.
* Proficiency in managing requirements using specialized tools like DOORS and SystemWeaver.
* In-depth knowledge of functional safety standards such as ISO 26262 and IEC 61508.
* Experience with functional safety risk assessment and analysis methodologies, including HARA, HAZOP, FTA, FMEDA, and FMEA.
* Excellent command of English, both spoken and written, along with strong communication skills.



It is an advantage if you have experience or knowledge in:


* Familiarity with hardware reliability metrics (FIT, SPFM, LFM) and experience in developing and implementing safety concepts.
* Knowledge of the V-Model and ASPICE standards.
* Understanding of AUTOSAR.



Is Etteplan the next step for you in your career journey? Submit your application today and become a part of our team!



The holiday season is usually a busy period when we have many job advertisements published and therefore also have many applicants interested in Etteplan. As a result, it may take longer than usual for us to get back to you regarding your status in the recruitment process. We thank you for your understanding and your patience!

title: Standardization Engineer and Open XR Optics Forum Coordinator
description:
Standardization Engineer and Open XR Optics Forum Coordinator
Europe, Remote
Role Overview:
Serve as subject matter expert on optical transmission systems in standardization organizations such as IEEE, ITU-T, OIF, ETSI, IETF, and other relevant bodies. Coordinate Infinera's contributions and collaborate with members and partners to promote XR Optics within the optical communications industry. Work with other standardization groups, MSAs, and industry initiatives to establish XR Optics and maintain Infinera as a key player in the optical communications sector.
https://openxropticsforum.org/
Key Responsibilities:* Standards Work: Engage as subject matter expert in standardization bodies on optical transceivers and transmission systems to support Infinera's product strategy in organizations such as IEEE, ITU-T, OIF, ETSI, IETF, and other relevant bodies.
* Standardization Coordination: Coordinate standardization contributions to different standardization bodies on Infinera technologies, including XR Optics related technologies and other technologies.
* Strategy Execution: Support and execute Infinera's XR Optics strategy focusing on standardization, interoperability, and multi-sourcing.
* Forum Management: Plan, prepare, and conduct Open XR Optics Forum meetings.
* Specification Development:
	+ Identify and coordinate relevant standards and interoperability specifications.
	+ Define, prioritize, and develop new specifications.
	+ Prepare contributions to specifications and oversee their review and documentation.
* White Papers: Conceptualize, create, and publish white papers.
* Technical Demonstrations: Plan, coordinate, and execute technical demonstrations and proof-of-concept tests.
* Marketing Management: Oversee the marketing activities of the Open XR Optics Forum.


Qualifications:* Advanced Degree (PhD preferred) in Electrical Engineering, Optical Communications, or a related field.
* Technical background and skillset to serve as subject matter expert on optical transceivers and transmission in standardization meetings in organizations such as IEEE, ITU-T, OIF, ETSI, IETF, and other relevant bodies.
* Product development and product management experience in the optical communications industry.
* Strong leadership and project management skills.
* Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.
* Ability to work collaboratively with internal teams and external partners.
* Strong analytical and problem-solving abilities.
* Prior knowledge of XR Optics is considered a strong benefit.
* Ability to travel as needed for standardization meetings and conferences.


This role requires strong leadership skills and a deep understanding of the optical communications industry. Prior knowledge of XR Optics is considered a strong benefit. If you are passionate about driving innovation and collaboration in XR Optics, we encourage you to apply.

title: Senior Verification Engineer
description:
**Senior Verification Engineer**

Are you passionate about system verification and testing for cutting-edge connectivity products? We are seeking a **Senior Verification Engineer** with expertise in Linux or Android OS testing to join our Service Platform Verification team. In this role, you will contribute to both automation and manual testing efforts, ensuring the highest quality for telematics products and services.

**Core Responsibilities**

* Perform system-level verification and testing for embedded software and connectivity products.
* Develop and enhance test methods, both manual and automated.
* Conduct exploratory testing of telematics products and services.
* Work hands-on with test rigs and improve the test environment.
* Develop simulations and document test methods.
* Act as the **Verification Function Owner** for assigned end-to-end (E2E) functions.

**Required Qualifications**

* Proven experience in verification work for distributed embedded systems.
* Proficiency in test automation scripting, particularly in **Python**.
* Familiarity with verification toolchains such as **Vector CAN tools** and **CANoe**.
* Experience with various test tools and frameworks, including REST API testing, stress testing, API automation, and UI automation for web and mobile.
* Hands-on experience with Android application testing.
* Strong verbal and written communication skills in English.

**Meriting Skills & Experience**

* Master’s degree in Electronics or Computer Engineering (or equivalent).
* Experience working within the **Heavy Duty** ecosystem.
* Truck driving license C.
* Familiarity with tools like **Jira**, **SE-Tool**, and **Protus**.
* Experience developing simulations in **CANoe**.
* Knowledge of **Robot Framework**, **Jenkins**, and telematics/infotainment markets.

**Why Join Us?**

* Work in a collaborative **Kanban team** focused on full system verification for innovative connectivity products.
* Engage with cutting-edge technologies and contribute to the development of industry-leading telematics solutions.
* Opportunity to take ownership of E2E functions and play a key role in system verification.
* A dynamic and supportive work environment with opportunities for professional growth.

If you’re an experienced verification engineer with a passion for testing and innovation, we’d love to hear from you. Apply now and help us deliver exceptional telematics products and services!

title: Research Engineer Beamline Office
description:
Lunds universitet grundades 1666 och rankas återkommande som ett av världens främsta lärosäten. Här finns omkring 47 000 studenter och mer än 8 800 medarbetare i Lund, Helsingborg och Malmö. Vi förenas i vår strävan att förstå, förklara och förbättra vår värld och människors villkor. Lunds universitet välkomnar sökande med olika bakgrund och erfarenheter. Jämställdhet, lika villkor och mångfald är grundläggande principer för alla delar av vår verksamhet.

**Your team**  

The Beamline Office at MAX IV operates within the Science Division and comprises four specialized teams, each dedicated to delivering advanced support across various stages of beamline development—from initial project proposals to full user operations. The project engineer role is positioned within the beamline support team, which is responsible for managing small to medium-sized projects (BPAG), addressing urgent needs across all beamlines, representing beamlines in interdisciplinary projects, and potentially managing large-scale projects within the Central Project Office's (CPO) portfolio which involve multiple beamline stakeholders. Additionally, the team coordinates the conceptual and technical design reports for prospective beamline initiatives.  

  

**MAX IV is looking for a project engineer who will** work with the current beamline support team, ensuring timely and effective delivery of BPAG projects in close partnership with beamlines. The engineer will also work with resource groups to refine and enhance processes for planning and prioritizing project tasks. This role may involve leading or coordinating resource-focused projects or those with significant stakeholder engagement across the Science Division.  

  

**Your main work tasks will be**

* Oversee and coordinate a portfolio of small to medium-sized projects and tasks.
* Strategically plan and prioritize beamline activities in collaboration with the CPO and relevant resource groups.
* Contribute actively to BPAG project execution where your expertise is applicable.
* Serve as project manager for CPO projects, ensuring alignment with multiple beamline stakeholders.
* Represent the beamline and science division in cross-functional, facility-wide initiatives.
* Facilitate the delivery of conceptual and technical design documentation for new beamlines.

  

**To be successful in this role you need to have the following qualifications**

* Ph.D. or engineering background in a STEM field.
* Proven experience in coordinating complex projects or tasks.
* Strong ability to work independently.
* Proficient in English with excellent communication and teamwork skills.

 **Below are seen as merits**

* Project management experience
* Experience working at a large science facility.
* Proficient in 2D/3D CAD/CAM software.
* Background in the design, servicing, or maintenance of scientific equipment.

 **As a person, you are** organised, take initiative, and enjoy taking on new and challenging tasks.  

  

**What we offer**  

When you join our MAX IV team, you step into a world of front edge science. We make the invisible visible by supporting scientist from all over the world, generating scientific results for the benefit of society. We offer you a multicultural work environment with great opportunities for personal development with respect for a healthy work-life balance.  

  

Would you like to work in a challenging and supporting environment? Then join us and take the opportunity to make a real difference!  

  

For further information, please visit:  

https://www.lunduniversity.lu.se/about-lund-university/work-lund-university  

www.sweden.se  

https://www.maxiv.lu.se/about-us/careerjobs/comp\_and\_benefits/  

  

Probationary period may apply.

  

Universitetet tillämpar individuell lönesättning. Ange gärna löneanspråk i din ansökan.

  

MAX IV är ett nationellt forskningslaboratorium med Lunds universitet som värduniversitet. MAX IV tillhandahåller toppmodern utrustning för forskning inom områden som teknik, fysik, strukturbiologi, kemi och nanoteknik. MAX IV kommer att ta emot upp till 2 000 nationella och internationella forskare årligen, vilka genomför banbrytande experiment inom material- och biovetenskap med hjälp av det briljanta röntgenljuset.


Vi undanber oss alla kontakter från annonsförsäljare, rekryterings- och bemanningsföretag på grund av statliga upphandlingsregler.

title: Konfigurationsledare (CM) till försvarsindustrin
description:
### **JOB DESCRIPTION**



**Vill du använda din tekniska expertis för att bidra till samhällets säkerhet?** Bli en del av en innovativ bransch som ständigt utvecklas och där ditt arbete gör skillnad varje dag.  



**Om tjänsten**



Som konfigurationsledare / Configuration Manager inom försvarsindustrin kommer du inte bara möta tekniska utmaningar, du kommer också ha möjlighet att utvecklas långsiktigt i en bransch som bidrar till säkerheten för samhället. Teknikstacken är stor och produkterna är komplexa, men det finns stora möjligheter att själv påverka lösningar och teknikval, samt ett stort utrymme för innovation. Du kommer att arbeta med design, utveckling och integration av avancerade system för högteknologiska försvarsapplikationer. Varje dag på jobbet kommer vara viktig och du kommer kunna göra skillnad för allas trygghet.



Söker vi dig?



För att fungera i rollen ser vi att du har en ingenjörsexamen inom relevant område såsom mekatronik, robotik, data, elektro- eller liknande


* Vi söker dig som inte bara vill arbeta med teknik, utan som vill vara med och skapa framtidens lösningar inom försvarsindustrin.
* Du är en lagspelare som gärna stöttar andra och delar med dig av din kunskap
* Du pratar och skriver på svenska och engelska obehindrat
* Enbart svensk medborgare är ett plus.
* Minst 5 års erfarenhet av konfigurationshantering inom mjukvaruutveckling
* Kan vara på plats hos kunden i Karlskoga, 100%.


Söker du oss?



Vi är ett team av engagerade ingenjörer som stöttar varandra och delar kunskap för att lösa komplexa tekniska utmaningar. Vi har roligt på jobbet, högt i tak och ett engagerande klimat. Du står aldrig ensam inför en utmaning utan kan bolla idéer och hitta möjligheter tillsammans med dina kollegor.



Som konsult på Sigma ges du möjlighet att verka inom en rad olika branscher, där du antingen är på plats hos kund eller på Sigmas kontor via satellit- och in-houseprojekt. Vi har bland annat projekt inom fordonsindustrin, försvarsindustrin, Life Science, låsindustrin, konsumentprodukter, livsmedel och elektrifiering. Vi bryter ständigt mark inom nya, spännande områden. Hos oss kan du hitta det just du brinner för lättare än på ett traditionellt företag.



Det finns mycket att berätta om Sigma Industry, våra värderingar och vår verksamhet. Kort och gott är ingenjören hjälten och vårt hjärta finns i tekniken. Vi driver digitalisering och deltar i utvecklingen av morgondagens teknologi. Sigma Industry är ett entreprenörsdrivet företag med stora visioner och korta beslutsvägar, vilket ger goda möjligheter att påverka såväl din egen som företagets framtid. Vill du bli expert inom ditt befintliga område, växa in i ett nytt eller engagera dig internt på Sigma? Möjligheterna är oändliga och hos oss får du allt i ett: en trygg anställning, en stimulerande vardag och en skräddarsydd framtid. Låter vi som en perfect match?



Läs gärna mer om vår verksamhet på sigmaindustryeastnorth.se



Vill du bli vår nya kollega?



**Vi ser fram emot att lära känna dig!**

Vi hoppas att du känner dig nyfiken på oss och vi ser fram emot att läsa din ansökan och ditt CV. Urval och intervjuer sker löpande så skicka in din ansökan redan i dag.



Kontakt



**Har du fler frågor? Hör av dig så berättar vi mer!**

Johan Söderroos: 073-647 70 52, johan.soderroos@sigma.se

title: Quality Engineer
description:
*Are you passionate about quality and innovation? As a Quality Engineer at our Askersund production plant, you’ll play a pivotal role in ensuring that our products meet rigorous standards. Join our dynamic team and contribute to cutting-edge medical device manufacturing, where innovation and excellence drive our success.*

The Askersund Plant, with approx. 90 employees is characterized by a modern organization and you can expect an exciting and developing environment with high ambitions to always be at the forefront. At the site, Sorbact is produced, a wound care dressing that helps in the fight against antibiotic resistance worldwide. At Essity, you have great opportunities to work with a fantastic team and to be a central part of the company's innovative and progressive work.


Our corporate culture is characterized by a familiar atmosphere with a strong entrepreneurial spirit where cooperation and personal development are encouraged. You will be a member of an inspiring and affirmative team, where we help each other and work together towards set goals.


The position is located in Askersund. You will report to the Quality Manager on site.


**About the role**
------------------

In this role, you will ensure that products and processes meet established specifications and quality standards while using collected findings to identify opportunities for continuous improvement. In close cooperation with production, logistic and project department you will ensure that product quality and processes meet requirements. You will act as a Role Model for Safety and Quality and training others. You will also update instructions and SOPs within the QMS and be a part of investigation of non-conformities. As you will work cross-functionally in some projects, it is important that you have both integrity and a non-prestigious approach when it comes to problem solving and collaboration.


**What you will do:**
---------------------

* Perform inspections and set quality standards for both in-process and finished products and materials
* Conduct inspections, such as verification and validation of components, materials, products, and clean rooms
* Release final and semi-final products
* Train and oversee the quality team and operators in their use of control forms, procedures, and correcting quality problems
* Act as a quality change manager
* Act as an internal representative providing QA knowledge and strategy to more complex projects
* Identify and address recurring problems either with the quality of the product or the reliability of testing procedures. Document quality issues and performance measures for management review
* Perform continuous improvement projects, leading root cause analysis activities, acting as CAPA owner, and performing process/product/software validations
* Apply quality principles, analyze quality records, prepare reports, and recommend improvements
* Ensure the performance of yearly dose audits in cooperation with suppliers
* Perform internal and external audits
* Support our customers/stakeholders with quality documentation upon request

**Who You Are**
---------------

We are looking for someone who is structured and meticulous. You enjoy documentation and are keen on learning new skills. Additionally, you have:


* Proven experience working with sterilizing and clean rooms
* At least 2-3 years of experience working within Med-tech, Pharmaceutical, or Food industries

title: Alexander Sanatgari
description:
**Job Title:** Electrical Assembly Engineer
  
The successful candidate will have experience working with battery module PACK automated assembly lines and will be responsible for electrical assembly, debugging, and troubleshooting of non-standard automated systems. This role requires a strong understanding of electronic technology, PLC control principles, and a thorough knowledge of electrical wiring and schematics.
  
  

**Key Responsibilities:**  

**Automated Assembly Line Expertise:** Familiar with software, hardware, and assembly standards for battery module PACK automated assembly lines of OEMs.
  
**Electrical Schematics PLC Knowledge:** Proficient in reading electrical schematics and understanding PLC control principles.
  
**Automation Electrical Control:** Experience with electrical control systems, automation assembly, and wiring of automation equipment. Able to identify and troubleshoot electrical issues based on drawings.
  
**Process Support Quality Management:** Provide process technical support on the production site, supervise process discipline, and ensure quality control during assembly. Review and improve process equipment design and application.
  
**Troubleshooting:** Lead the troubleshooting and joint debugging of equipment, conducting preliminary inspections and analyses of components with quality issues, and proposing improvements to resolve discovered problems.
  
**Safety Compliance:** Ensure adherence to electrical safety standards and continuously improve safety procedures.
  
  

**Requirements:**  

Degree in Electrical Engineering, Automation, or a related field (or equivalent experience).
  
At least 3 years of experience in electrical assembly and debugging, particularly in automated systems related to lithium battery modules.
  
Strong knowledge of electrical schematics and PLC control systems.
  
Expertise in automation, electrical wiring, and system diagnostics.
  
Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
  
Basic knowledge of English. Knowledge of Mandarin or Swedish is a plus.
  
  

**We Offer:**  

Competitive salary and benefits package.
  
Career growth opportunities in a global company.
  
A dynamic, team-oriented work environment.

title: Analysis Engineer
description:
**Can you engineer a brighter tomorrow?**
-----------------------------------------

  

  

It’s crystal clear: the actions we take in the next few years will significantly impact our future. At Volvo Cars, we embrace change. We’re committed to transforming the automotive industry and leading in electrification. For this, we’re seeking out more creative minds to shape that future. Don’t miss this opportunity to create your tomorrow.

  


**Let's introduce ourselves**
-----------------------------


**Software Update - Complete Vehicle Engineering**


**What we offer**  

Do you like to take part in developing our new focus area, responsible for SW-update in complete vehicles and test objects for different purpose and project’s. We are a shared service team, consisting of experienced colleagues and we can offer you the opportunity to work with all vehicle programs throughout the concept phase until start of production.


**What you'll do**
------------------



Your main task will be to support with SW-update in test objects and deliver updated test objects to secure further testing with latest software. This include update test objects to the latest baseline or according to costumers’ desire as well as downloading and sort baselines during different project phases. You will have a close collaboration with our customers from different stakeholders with Volvo Cars.


**What you'll bring**
---------------------



You take initiative to introduce new solutions and do not hesitate to ask colleagues for help as well as assist when needed. The role will also require a driven person, good computer skills, driving license (B) and acting as team player. If you have knowledge about Volvos internal processes and basic knowledge of DSA, PIE R&D, PIE, test object process and/or fault tracing it is considered meritorious.


**Ready to Take the Next Step?**
--------------------------------

  

  

Please submit your application through our career page. Due to GDPR regulations, we’re unable to store or consider applications from other platforms. Make sure to submit your application in English. Once your application is successfully submitted, you’ll receive a confirmation email. Applications are open until the 30th of December 2024. We’re excited to get to know you!

  


**Volvo Cars – driving change together**
----------------------------------------

  

  

Volvo Cars’ success is the result of a collaborative, diverse and inclusive working environment. Today, we’re one of the most well-known and respected car brands, with around 43,000 employees across the globe. At Volvo Cars, your career is designed around your skills and aspirations, so you can reach your fullest potential.


And it’s so exciting – we’re well on our way on our journey towards full electrification. We have five fully electric cars already on the market, and five more on the way. Our fully-electric and plug-in hybrid cars combined make up almost 50 per cent of our sales. So come and join us in shaping the future of mobility. There’s never been a more rewarding time to play your part in our inspiring and creative teams!

  


Curious about Life at Volvo Cars? Read more


Curious about our story? Read more

title: Teknisk projektledare
description:
### **JOB DESCRIPTION**



Vill du vara en del av ett dynamiskt team som driver innovation och förändring inom olika branscher? Trivs du med att ha ett omväxlande jobb och skapa meningsfulla lösningar som kan förändra människors liv? Välkommen till Sigma Industry!


Som teknisk projektledare har du ansvaret för att driva och leda tekniska projekt från koncept till färdig leverans. Du arbetar nära tvärfunktionella team som inkluderar utvecklare, ingenjörer och externa leverantörer för att säkerställa att projekten levereras inom budget, på tid och med hög kvalitet. Rollen kräver ett starkt fokus på både tekniska detaljer och projektledning, där du fungerar som bryggan mellan teknik och affärsbehov.



Huvudsakliga arbetsuppgifter:



* Leda och samordna hela projektets livscykel, från planering och utveckling till implementering och uppföljning.
* Utveckla och underhålla detaljerade projektplaner, inklusive tidslinjer, resurshantering och budgetuppföljning.
* Säkerställa att tekniska lösningar möter både affärsmässiga och kundspecifika krav.
* Arbeta nära intressenter för att säkerställa att projektets mål och leveranser är tydligt definierade och uppnådda.
* Identifiera och hantera projektrelaterade risker och problem samt föreslå lämpliga åtgärdsplaner.
* Leda regelbundna statusmöten och rapportera framsteg till ledningen och andra berörda parter.
* Samarbeta med tvärfunktionella team för att säkra kvalitet och leverans av tekniska lösningar.

### **BASIC QUALIFICATIONS**



**Rollen kräver att du har:**



Teknisk ingenjörsutbildning (BSc eller MSc)



>3 års erfarenhet som projektledare och/scrum master



>4 års arbetserfarenhet sedan examen



Drivit projekt i projekts olika faser



**Meriterande:**



Certifiering inom projektledning (t.ex. PMP, Safe)



Erfarenhet från Försvar, Energi, Fordon, Medtech eller Industri



Erfarenhet av att arbeta med projektstyrningsverktyg, som exempelvis Jira samt metodologier som Agile


### **PREFERRED ADDITIONAL SKILLS, PERSONAL TRAITS AND EXPERIENCE**



Med din gedigna erfarenhet av projektledning har du en djup förståelse för vad som krävs för att nå framgång. Du har en naturlig förmåga att motivera både dig själv och ditt team, vilket gör att ni tillsammans kan ta er till nästa nivå och leverera starka resultat. Din strukturerade arbetsmetod och ditt engagemang säkerställer att projekten drivs framåt med både fokus och effektivitet.



Vi söker dig som har utmärkta kommunikationsfärdigheter och en förmåga att förmedla information tydligt och målmedvetet. Du är lyhörd för kundens behov och strävar alltid efter att leverera lösningar som skapar långsiktigt värde och säkerställer projektens framgång. Din förmåga att snabbt anpassa dig till nya kulturer och situationer samt att bygga och underhålla starka relationer är en av dina främsta styrkor. För dig är varje utmaning en möjlighet till utveckling och förbättring.



Du är orädd och driven, med ett stort intresse för konsultrollen där du kontinuerligt får möjlighet att möta nya miljöer, branscher och kontakter. Genom att ta dig an dessa utmaningar på ett lösningsorienterat och strategiskt sätt, skapar du inte bara framgång för dina projekt utan även för din egen karriär.


### **WE OFFER**



 Vi är oerhört stolta över att Sigma Industry East North Group har blivit rankad som #6 på listan: Sveriges Bästa Arbetsgivare 2023 i kategorin små- till medelstora arbetsgivare. 


Hos oss står alltid konsulten i centrum, vår affär är uppbyggd kring vår förmåga att anställa och utveckla de bästa förmågorna inom våra områden.



Som privatägt bolag tittar vi inte på börskursen eller förbereder inför nästa kvartalsrapport, vi fokuserar istället på stabil och långsiktig utveckling, vilket bidrar med det samma för våra konsulter.



Utöver detta erbjuder vi:


* Förmånsprogram via vår partner Benify
* Friskvårdsbidrag
* Bonus vid tips om rekrytering eller uppdrag
* Kollektivavtal
* Aktivitet er
* Konferenser
* Med mera

### **MORE INFORMATION**

  



Mostafa Jalal,  

+46 761282009  

Mostafa.Jalal@sigma.se

Teknisk projektledare

Sigma Industry Services

Electricity & Automation, Energy & Power Engineering, Project Management & Management, PLM, Project Management, Project Management, Software development, Automation, Management

title: Junior AI Engineer
description:
***We are on a mission to enable the A.I. & Data-driven world and we have the experience to do it. But we are looking for more talented individuals to help us drive this change in the world.***




  





 Are you a recent graduate or soon-to-be graduate with a passion for Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning? Do you want to kickstart your career with a talented team that's shaping the future of AI?
 



  





 We're a dynamic startup building innovative solutions using cutting-edge technologies like Large Language Models (LLMs). We're now looking for motivated Junior Engineers to join our team and help drive our mission forward.
 



  





**About the Role** 




 As a Junior Engineer, you'll work on exciting projects with our experienced team, providing top-notch services while fostering thought leadership. You'll have the opportunity to collaborate with renowned brands in various industries, gaining exposure to diverse AI setups and technologies from around the globe.
 



  





 We're looking for candidates who are familiar with some of the following:
 



  




* A variety of LLMs (both open and closed source)
* Different types of RAG pipelines for ingesting data
* LangChain for building custom workflows and orchestration
* Streamlit for creating data-driven visualizations and applications
* Docker for packaging and deploying applications
* Other useful tools and technologies in the AI/ML ecosystem



  





**Your profile:** 



* Currently pursuing or recently completed a degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or related fields
* Strong foundation in programming languages like Python or C++
* Good understanding of machine learning concepts and LLMs
* Familiarity with open-source frameworks and tools
* Strong problem-solving skills and willingness to learn



  





**What We Offer** 



* Be part of a dynamic company that's shaping the future of AI
* Competitive base salary with performance-based bonuses
* Flexibility: work from anywhere, anytime (remote-friendly)
* Access to the latest technologies and opportunities for growth
* Professional development support to help you grow in your career



  





**Why Join Us?** 




 We're committed to creating a collaborative and supportive environment that fosters innovation and creativity. Our team is passionate about AI and ML, and we're looking for talented individuals who share our enthusiasm.
 



  





 Unfortunately, this job is placed in Stockholm and we don't offer reallocation and visa sponsorship for this role.

title: Test Engineer
description:

 We are seeking a skilled Test Engineer with a strong background in cybersecurity and infotainment systems to collaborate on projects in the automotive domain.

title: Open Application
description:
***Resolution Games is a Stockholm-based VR/AR studio focused on creating immersive experiences for all — from gamers to non-gamers alike.***




  





**Ready to join the journey of helping us take players inside the game?** 




  





 If you’re passionate about pushing the boundaries of gaming and want to be part of a team that’s defining the next era of Extended Reality (XR), we want to hear from you!
 



 Even if your ideal role isn’t available right now, we believe in the value of talent and passion. We’d love to connect with innovative individuals who are excited about what we’re doing. Who knows? The perfect opportunity might be just around the corner.
 



  





 Tell us what you're looking for in your application. Whether you're a visionary coder, a talented artist, a sound design expert, a captivating storyteller, or a marketing professional, we welcome individuals with a wide range of skills and backgrounds. We value expertise and creativity across all professions.
 



  





 At Resolution Games, diversity and innovation are at the heart of everything we do. We thrive on fresh perspectives and embrace the unique qualities each individual brings to the table. Together, we’re crafting experiences that take players beyond the game and into entirely new realities.
 



  





 Don’t wait – share your details with us today! If a role opens that matches your skills, we’ll reach out to you. Join us in defining the future of XR gaming.
 



  





**Who we are** 




 Resolution Games is a visual computing studio with a proven track record creating immersive gaming experiences for all. We believe that VR and AR aren’t just an add-on for gaming; they are the next logical steps for games. As players and game developers alike, we’ve always dreamed of this day - the day when we can be IN the games we love. That day is finally here, and we are putting all of our energy into making the most of it for all, whether it’s creating a positive experience for someone testing out VR for the first time to delivering a rich, in-depth multiplayer game that keeps enthusiasts hungry for more.
 



  





 We are looking for someone who wants a unique opportunity and enjoys collaborating. Someone who wants to be a part of a team raising the bar and creating a new set of standards. Our colleagues have can-do attitudes who appreciate a small studio culture. Therefore, even though we have grown, we continue to work in small teams and experiment while tackling complex challenges. We value having every voice heard and seek out diversity, equity, and inclusion in everything we do. Last but not least, we want those of you who are not just skilled but also a great addition to the team. That is because we believe in team over the individual, a great mix of freedom with responsibility, and that people should always come before the
 



 process.

title: Game Mathematician - NetEnt Slots
description:
Evolution is a multinational business at the forefront of the online gaming industry. We have an extensive track record of number 1s and are always looking for great people to help us create the next big product hit. Our team of 1,000+ engineers operates out of 8 engineering hubs running code 24/7/365 to serve users around the world. This is run through a modern software stack that supports over 250 fully automated releases per month in our main live environment. We believe in building in-house competence and agile work processes so that we can deliver on our Engineering mission:
 *A flawless player experience.*
**Job Description**
 Having tons of fun in a diverse and creative environment has made Evolution a leading provider of premium gaming solutions to the online casino industry. Creating everything in-house, from design to game production and platforms. Sounds intriguing?
   

  

 We are looking for a talented individual to join our innovative Math & Game Analytics team at NetEnt. This individual will work primarily as a Game Mathematician for online slot games for the NetEnt brand, helping turn novel game concepts into java prototypes with the support of a talented team of developers and designers. The secondary function of this role is to help build our team’s game analytics capabilities with the use of data technologies such as SQL, R and/or Python. The perfect candidate would see themselves as a Game Designer rather than a traditional mathematician, marrying the primary and secondary responsibilities of the role by using data to inform the decision-making processes in game design.
   

  

**Responsibilities:**
* Learn new technologies and develop your skills while helping us achieve our goal of providing the best games on the market.
* Work closely together with our Game Mathematicians, Game Teams and our core development teams to build games and create, improve, and maintain our tools and algorithms.
* Develop, optimize and maintain our tools for prototyping, simulating and solving games.
* Implement algorithms for solving statistical and combinatorial problems.
* Implement game logic.
* Investigate techniques, such as various optimization methods, to solve old challenges in new ways.


**Qualifications**
**Who are you?**
 We're looking for a team player with an innovative personality with a passion to learn new things. You hold a natural talent for understanding and solving abstract and complex problems and have a good eye for detail. It is important that you have an interest in understanding how different math models relate to and translate into player behavior and what appeals to the end user. We think you should have an interest in games from a mathematical and player perspective.
   

  

**Skills & Experience:**
* University degree in Mathematics, Computer Science or equivalent
* Extensive, hands-on experience with Java technologies.
* Data analytics experience using SQL, R and/or Python to query data and derive insights.
* Strong mathematical intuition.
* Good understanding of programming paradigms - such as OOP and functional programming.
* Fluent in spoken and written English
* Team player with an innovative personality
* Talent for understanding and solving abstract and complex problems
* Detail-oriented


**Additional Information**
 Exiting opportunity at our brand-new office in the heart of Stockholm with amazing colleagues! Join our dynamic international team and be a part of a vibrate work environment where innovation thrives. Embrace the city´s energy as you contribute to our company´s growth!
   

  

 Join our dynamic international team and be a part of a vibrant work environment where innovation thrives. Embrace the city´s energy as you contribute to our company´s growth!
   

  

 Evolution provides a dynamic and creative work environment with a unique opportunity for the right people to enhance their skills and drive their passion. Our culture is rooted in Evolution’s core values ALIVE, do RIGHT and work TOGETHER and we operate guided by our vision to become the leading supplier of online casino in the world.
   

  

**Our Benefits Are**
* Competitive pension, health and medical insurance
* 30 paid vacation days
* Fitness benefit (Friskvårdsbidrag)
* Professional growth
* Sport activities, parties, team buildings


 If you want to be part of one of the most exciting industries in the world, then apply now and be a key player in our success story!
